msubsection.title: list
msubsection.p: lists the content of a repository

attribute.name: delimiter
attribute.doc: The delimiter to be used for separation of the list.

attribute.name: listDirs
attribute.doc: If enabled directory entries will be listed.

attribute.name: listFiles
attribute.doc: If enabled file entries will be listed.

attribute.name: onlyNames
attribute.doc: If enabled only the names will be listed otherwise the complete urls.

attribute.name: property
attribute.doc: Property which will receive the resulting value.

attribute.name: recurse
attribute.doc: Allows to list the complete subtree if true. Use it carefully.

attribute.name: revision
attribute.doc: The revision used to get the listing from.

attribute.name: url
attribute.doc: The URL which content shall be listed.
